content: I have a credit card that is about to expire and haven't got a new one yet, so need the expiry updated or to be issued a new card. My wife and I also have joint cards and I can't remember all of them, so can you give me a list? My customer ID is 331-9928. Thanks.

rejected:
---
Action:
- add_credit_card
    customer_id: 331-9928
- get_credit_cards
    customer_id: 331-9928
- update_credit_card
    customer_id: 331-9928
    card_number: $(find joint cards)
